function.name: find_news
function.description: Finds news on the web given a query. This function uses the Bing Search API to find news on the web given a query. The response includes the most relevant news articles from the web and should be used if you're looking for news.

query.description: An optimal search query to find news on the web using the Bing Search API

market.description: The market to search in, e.g. en-US - it should match the language of the query
